Nocivus.text: Cannot attend the meeting of the Board

Noctifer.text: Cannot attend the meeting of the Committee

Noctua.text: Consult the colonel and let me know result

Nodosus.text: Will you exchange with me for ---

Nomino.text: Can my leave be extended to ---

Nomus.text: Extension of leave cannot be sanctioned

Nonageni.text: Extension of leave cannot be sanctioned, you must return at once

Nonanus.text: Extension of leave required on legal affairs until ---

Nonassis.text: Extension of leave required on urgent family affairs until ---

Nondum.text: Extension of leave required on urgent private affairs until ---

Nonnemo.text: Extension of leave required, please sanction until ---

Noscito.text: Is my extension of leave sanctioned

Nosco.text: Furlough to all officers on leave has been cancelled, and they are ordered to rejoin their regiments by ---

Nossem.text: Furlough to all officers on leave has been cancelled, and they are ordered to rejoin at once ---

Noster.text: The prohibition of furlough to officers on leave has been cancelled ---
